subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. cleared the Colts on Monday of charges made by the Patriots that the Colts had pumped artificial crowd noise into the RCA Dome during Sunday’s game.
snippet: The N.F.L. cleared the Colts on Monday of charges made by the Patriots that the Colts had pumped artificial crowd noise into the RCA Dome during Sunday’s game.
